availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Kemper (Floyd County, Kentucky, coal mine owner.)

body.p: Floyd County, Kentucky, coal mine owner. Cincinnati, Ohio native. Acquired a mortgage on land near Abbott Creek in Floyd County from James A. Walls on July 2, 1856. Landlord and employer of Elizabeth Palmer's husband in 1861. Accused of falsely charging Elizabeth Palmer of adultery in Floyd County on January 12, 1861.

ab.bibl: Henry P. Scalf, Kentucky's Last Frontier 3rd ed. (Johnson City, TN: The Overmountain Press, 2000), 199.
